mapper.select: SELECT /* ProductSubInfoMapper.xml, getCidPrice, 정희원, 2015-01-02 */ * FROM ( SELECT EDP.PROD_ID, UP.USE_PERIOD, UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD, NVL(ETPRC.PROD_AMT, 0) AS PROD_AMT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD, UP.USE_PERIOD ORDER BY DECODE(ETPP.PROD_STATUS_CD, 'PD000403', 0, 1), ETPRC.PROD_AMT DESC) RN, (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE CD_ID = UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD AND LANG_CD = #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS USE_PERIOD_UNIT_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD EDP INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD ETPP ON ETPP.PROD_ID = EDP.PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE ETPRC ON ETPRC.PROD_ID = EDP.PROD_ID AND ETPRC.TENANT_ID = ETPP.TENANT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP ON EDP.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ETPP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sysdate between ETPRC.APPLY_START_DT AND ETPRC.APPLY_END_DT AND EDP.CID = #{cid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EDP.CID IN (SELECT CID FROM TB_DP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID=#{epsdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND EDP.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = 'PD002502' AND EDP.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' ) WHERE RN=1
